title: Asparagus and goats cheese quiche
ingredients: ['For the base', '180g wholemeal heat flour', '70g wholemeal spelt flour', '220g butter, frozen', '1 teaspoon salt', '120ml ice water', 'For the filling', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '400g thin asparagus tips, cut in 5 to 6cm pieces', '150g goats cheese', '250g ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon tarragon, finely chopped', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 pinch fennel fronds, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
